curam.util.persistence.validation.customizable.validator

Interface CollectionValidator


  • public interface CollectionValidator
    Validator methods for Java Collection objects.

    The methods verify that the validation with supplied ValidationContext is enabled before performing the check.

    If the validation is enabled, the methods perform the check. If the check is successful, the methods return true. If the check is unsuccessful, the methods flag to the error handling infrastructure that the validation has been unsuccessful, and then return false.

    If the validation is disabled, the methods all return true.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean empty(ValidationContext ctx, AppException appException, java.util.Collection<?> collection)
      Validates that the supplied Collection is empty.
      boolean memberOf(ValidationContext ctx, AppException appException, java.lang.Object object, java.util.Collection<?> collection)
      Validates that the supplied object is a member of the supplied Collection.
      boolean notEmpty(ValidationContext ctx, AppException appException, java.util.Collection<?> collection)
      Validates that the supplied Collection is not empty.
      boolean notMemberOf(ValidationContext ctx, AppException appException, java.lang.Object object, java.util.Collection<?> collection)
      Validates that the supplied object is not a member of the supplied Collection.

    • Method Detail

      • empty

        boolean empty(ValidationContext ctx,
              AppException appException,
              java.util.Collection<?> collection)
        Validates that the supplied Collection is empty.

        Note that passing a null value to the Collection parameter causes validation to fail.

        Parameters:
        ctx - The validation context for the validation.
        appException - The exception to use to indicate that the validation has failed.
        collection - The collection to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the validation is successful OR disabled, false if it is unsuccessful

      • memberOf

        boolean memberOf(ValidationContext ctx,
                 AppException appException,
                 java.lang.Object object,
                 java.util.Collection<?> collection)
        Validates that the supplied object is a member of the supplied Collection.

        Note that passing a null value to the Collection parameter causes validation to fail.

        Parameters:
        ctx - The validation context for the validation.
        appException - The exception to use to indicate that the validation has failed.
        object - The object to check for membership of the collection.
        collection - The collection in which to check for membership of the object.
        Returns:
        True if the validation is successful OR disabled, false if it is unsuccessful.

      • notEmpty

        boolean notEmpty(ValidationContext ctx,
                 AppException appException,
                 java.util.Collection<?> collection)
        Validates that the supplied Collection is not empty.

        Note that passing a null value to theCollection parameter causes validation to fail.

        Parameters:
        ctx - The validation context for the validation.
        appException - The exception to use to indicate that the validation has failed.
        collection - The collection to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the validation is successful, false if it is unsuccessful.

      • notMemberOf

        boolean notMemberOf(ValidationContext ctx,
                    AppException appException,
                    java.lang.Object object,
                    java.util.Collection<?> collection)
        Validates that the supplied object is not a member of the supplied Collection.

        Note that passing a null value to the Collection parameter causes validation to fail.

        Parameters:
        ctx - The validation context for the validation.
        appException - The exception to use to indicate that the validation has failed.
        object - The object to check for non-membership of the collection.
        collection - The collection in which to check for non-membership of the object.
        Returns:
        True if the validation is successful, false if it is unsuccessful.
